sources.title: 1934 Die Erbschaft ( Karl Valentin, Liesl Karlstadt)
sources.description: Film(Kurzfilm) aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1934. Die Erbschaft.  U.a mit Karl Valentin und Liesl Karlstadt

metadata.Plot: Karl Meier and his wife are some really poor folks. They don't have much to eat and they cannot pay for their flat. Even the bailiff does not know what to take from them anymore. One day they are told that they made an inheritance, because some relatives died recently. Their financial problems seem to be solved now.
metadata.Actors: Karl Valentin, Liesl Karlstadt, Justus Paris
